website_summaries.verdict: If you're searching for a natural deodorant, Schmidt's is a fantastic choice. Available in a variety of soothing scents, Schmidt's Natural Deodorant is a winner.
pros: The innovative formula works to neutralize odor and absorb wetness, naturally without the use of aluminum or parabens
cons: The creamy consistency can cause white streaks on clothing

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this one
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this one. Seemed to work great the first 4-5 days until I felt pain and discovered 7-8 swollen red lymph nodes in my armpit. Ouchie Ouch ouch!! Worst reaction I have had and I have sensitive skin, so believe me I have had bad reactions to body products. Wont use this again and my quest for a safe and effective deodorant continues. It's a bummer bc it smelled pretty good but not worth it if you can have such a severe reaction to it. Upon other reviews I noticed many others are reacting too. Schmidts Please fix this
customer_reviews.author: reemsco30

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product
customer_reviews.text: In less than two weeks, I got a burn under both of my arms. I am disgusted, upset, angry and mad that NOW I have to spend more money to see a dermatologist to work with me on getting rid of this burn or rash. My skin is not sensitive and I have never experience such horrible discoloration in all of my 40 plus years.
customer_reviews.author: D&A Enterprise

customer_reviews.title: ... star because as far as odor goes this works great, but it burnt my underarms really bad
customer_reviews.text: One star because as far as odor goes this works great, but it burnt my underarms really bad. I would stay away from this product. I think the baking soda concentration may be too high. It burnt my husband too
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Burn
customer_reviews.text: I don't have sensitive skin and was so excited to use this product. After a couple of days of using this product I noticed a rash but seemed to be more of a burn like appearance. I went back to the reviews and read others who had the same reaction. Like I said I dont have sensitive skin and have luckily never had a bad reaction to any deodorant before but something was wrong with this product. Loved the feel and smell and the coverage was great so I'm so disappointed I had this reaction!!! I also never write reviews but thought others should know of the possible reaction.
customer_reviews.author: cristy

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Chemical burn!!! Terrible! First time I was cutting it some slavk. Tried again 2 months later, and its bad!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ib

customer_reviews.title: Skin irritation after a year of using
customer_reviews.text: I've been happily using this deodorant for about a year now and it has been the best for odor control. Unfortunately I too now have this terrible skin reaction to it with unbearable itching and pain. I wonder what ingredient is causing the irritation?!
customer_reviews.author: Barrym21

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this deodorant, I’ve used the tube version of it before but I wanted something more eco friendly. Love the glass jar and the recycling program and it is a very effective deodorant. The little spatula definitely helps. I am a very sweaty smelly person and I think the lime really helps to hide the smell. It’s not messy like people would think either. My only complaint is that when you’re first using it the spatula doesn’t fit in the lid and I was traveling and it melted everywhere. In that sense it is a little more temperature sensitive than the stick version of this same deodorant but few products have been able to withstand this California heat
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Caused awful rash
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this deodorant and I thought it was working well until the weather warmed up a bit. Once I actually started sweating this deodorant caused me to break up in a horribly painful and itchy rash in my armpits. I had to refrain from using anything at all until it cleared up (which took 2 weeks). I wanted to test if it was the deodorant causing the rash so I tried it once more and immediately broke out again. I'm back to good ol' Tom's deodorant again.
customer_reviews.author: MountainMama

customer_reviews.title: Itch. Burn. No es bueno
customer_reviews.text: Based on what I'm reading from the other bad reviews I too am experiencing "chemical burn." In the last year I have developed sensitivity to commercial deodorant, Toms included and have been searching for the right natural solution. This stuff makes me itch/burn and has given me skin discoloration as well. No es Bueno. I haven't bothered to contact the company and frankly don't care! I just want a freakin' deodorant that won't hurt or cause health problems! And I also had issue with the amount in the jar :-/ not that it matters now.
customer_reviews.author: SamiSays

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coverage
customer_reviews.text: Judging by a number of reviews, Schmidt's contains a fairly common allergen (that's the reason for the four stars instead of five). Luckily, I'm not allergic to whatever it is, even though I react to plenty of cosmetics (dr. Hauschka, Helena Rubinstein, Estée Lauder). If you're not sensitive to the allergen in Schmidt deodorant, I highly recommend it: It's the best deodorant I've ever used. It takes a little longer to apply: Scrape enough out of the jar to roll into a little ball, massage under arm, repeat for the other arm, wash hands. I keep a spray deodorant for when I'm in a real hurry, but in general, I use this.
customer_reviews.author: desert traveler

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I have used natural deodorants for years. This was my first time trying this brand. I followed the instructions. Unfortunately, a week later, my underarms are still discolored and irritated.
customer_reviews.author: dimples0

customer_reviews.title: Major fail.
customer_reviews.text: THis is definitely a pass for me. It neither works for me, nor can I keep it from being a total mess. In the winter it’s very crumbly and it pretty much crumbles everywhere. I’ve had to spend actual time thinking about how to put it on so it doesn’t crumble off my armpit onto the floor, where my puppy eats it before I can clean it up. I also purchased the stick previously and it was so hard it hurt my armpit and I am not sensitive. I found another vegan deodorant I like much better and it’s creamy. This is crusty like baking soda
customer_reviews.author: AGW

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: First off, the smell is wonderful. I've been using this one for about a week but have noticed that I sweat more and my armpits feel wet more often than the other natural deodorant I was using. I'll also note that I have the Schmidt's stick as well for a month+ and have similar issues with it. I heard the paste was better so decided to try it out. I also find myself having to reapply more often. Overall, it's not bad. Going to finish it out and see if anything changes though.
customer_reviews.author: thunker

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind is worth the change in habit!
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely different to put on if you're used to sticks or roll on deodorant. But I like the peace of mind knowing I'm not putting harmful chemicals on my body. I'm giving it a 5 for now because it seems to work...But I'm curious how it's going to do in a Louisiana summer and whether or not it will leave stains on clothing. I've only been wearing it a few days so I haven't tested it in the wash yet! But so far, so good. I like the scent and it seems to keep me from getting to stinky. So, mission accomplished
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I DO like natural deodorants
customer_reviews.text: This is a unique product to handle. Being conditioned since 5th grade to swipe some Secret on my pits, going to a dry, pasty natural product was a leap for me. I DO like natural deodorants. This just isn't the formula for me. I have even used different jar deodorant products that have been easier to apply. My best advice is scoop out a small ball, stick on your underarm and close it for a few seconds. The warmth of your body will make it more easily spreadable. More hassle than I needed. I love the stick formula of Schmidt's is the Lime scent. Its still a bit rough to spread, but works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Love the actual product, just didn’t receive everything described.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Schmidt’s for a while, and I thought I would try the jar after my last stick was done. My jar didn’t come with a spatula, so it’s honestly difficult to put on. I did contact amazon, and they were very helpful but couldn’t do much, as it was a manufacturer issue. Deodorant: 10/10 Quality control/packing: 5/10 Update as of September 2018: I’ve reordered this, and while I still love the actual product, I’ve had another issue with it. I did receive the little spatula, but the lid was not completely on the jar, so I lost a good 1/4 of product due to melting and spillage.
customer_reviews.author: Kate L.

customer_reviews.title: I love the scent
customer_reviews.text: It could just be my chemical make-up, but this doesn't work as well as the stick version. I love the scent, I don't mind having to put it on by warming it with my fingers, but it has good days and bad days. It hasn't stained any shirts, but sometimes it just doesn't work as well, and this can be on days I don't do any physical activity, just office work and walking around the office. Most days I have to reapply when I get home. I don't smell terrible, but I don't smell fresh. I would say you have to try it for yourself to see how your body takes it as it seems to work well for some.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: What’s with the jar
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what is up with these natural products that they purposely make them as difficult as possible to use. It is not possible to use that little scoopy thing and apply deodorant. I took an empty chapstick and filled it with the deodorant to use it that way. Why can’t these natural companies use their brains and put them in a stick form To be natural means you have to have the most difficult inconceivient routine in the world?
customer_reviews.author: Guppy

customer_reviews.title: Most effective natural deoderant I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I've found a great, clean, simple, and NATURAL deoderant product that works. It comes with a tiny spatula for scooping a small amount out. You apply the dense cream to your underarm using this tool or your fingers. At first, it took some getting used to, to apply it in this manner, because I have used traditional (natural) deoderant sticks and roll ons, where your fingers don't get messy. However, I prefer this! It really lasts! IT is by far the most effective natural and fragrance-free deoderant I have found. I've tried coconut oil, Kiss My Face, Tom's of Maine and others. I have re-ordered this and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: C. Eliason

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Gritty Texture and can cause a Rash or Chemical Burn
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a natural deodorant and thought to try Schmidt's. I didn't like the texture as its made out of shea butter and baking soda, so its hard and gritty and needs to be softened between the fingers before applying. Even then it doesn't apply smoothly. It was ok, it doesn't block odor as well as non-natural deodorants but that is to be expected. Unfortunately after a year of use, I developed a rash from using it which I hear is common when using deodorants made from baking soda. I am dark-skinned so it will take a while to fade. I wish I didn't buy two bottles of fairly expensive deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: I L Hubbard-Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It is the best of you don't shave! Smells so good
customer_reviews.text: I love this and have been using the lavender and sage scent for years. It smells awesome. I don't shave so haven't experienced any rash or discomfort. Based on other reviews, maybe it hurts after you shave. Also the product has been inconsistant. Sometimes it's chalky and white ( I actally prefer). Or keeps me smelling good into the night. Sometimes it's creamy which I don't like. Doesn't work as good. The old arm pit smell comes back before dinner time. Overall, the only deoderant I've ever used that I love!
customer_reviews.author: jess turner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this product!!! It took my skin a little bit to get used to it because the baking soda and/or one of the essential oils was a bit irritating to my skin at first. No reaction anymore, unless I am putting it on just after shaving. I have tried a ton of different organic/etc deodorants after deciding to go off antiperspirants, and this is the first one I have been happy with. No need to reapply throughout the day, and I have now even forgotten to put it on after a shower and no stink!!! This stuff is magic.
customer_reviews.author: Akhas

customer_reviews.title: Buy locally if you want consistent quality
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this deodorant for several years, and I love it. However, this particular jar doesn't scoop out nicely. It's all granulated and does not soften and spread like it ot to. It stays chunky when I try to apply it. Maybe it was overheated at some point or there was an inconsistency in production. Never had this problem when I bought in store or ordered on subscription from the manufacturer. Unfortunately for me Amazon is not letting me initiate a return on this item. I'd recommend buying this product from a store or the manufacturer so you can actually get a replacement if there's a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Is it the seller's issue??
customer_reviews.text: What the heck?? First I purchased the stick version of deodorant. The very first order was great! Product packaging was undamaged, formula was as expected and the actual deodorant itself is incredible and well worth the cost. The second time I ordered the stick--the formula was a weird bumpy mottled flaky consistency. I am in the process of returning this second purchase but ordered the jar version as replacement before I return the stick. The jar's lid is cracked! So far win/loss ratio is 1:2. I guess I'll shop around for a new merchant of this product.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Try oil then, paste for irritation free comfort and odor control
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin, I’ve figured out how to apply this deodorant with having a skin reaction! Use an oil like grape seed, rosehip or coconut first, then the Schmidt’s glides on without irritation. It works so well for me, zero odor so I kept trying to solve the reaction rash. I really like the lime and bergamot scent. Update: Still using Schmidt’s daily. Again, using a carrier oil on my skin first, really helps reduce irritation or reaction. Very happy with funk control.
customer_reviews.author: McLister

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant works! No rash, no problems. It took a couple of uses to get accustomed to applying this because I've never had deodorant in a jar, and now it's second nature. I love that there is no fragrance or perfume in this product. Before writing a review, I waited until we had some hot weather with a bit of activity involved and I was pleased with the results. This is on my to-buy-again list.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Lavender and sage
customer_reviews.text: This isn't my favorite scent from Schmidt, but I do like this product. It's not at all easy to spread - the stick would probably work better for me, but this lasts longer. I've read where others had severe reactions - I have not. This is the one product I've ever found that actually works and is natural. (And I sweat a lot! Even in winter months)
customer_reviews.author: C. Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Burns like Hades!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product really burns even if you use a small amount. I used a protective barrier of aloe vera gel and gold bond aloe lotion the night before and in the morning. I only applies the deo in the mornings. I still burned and it darkened my skin. I was on fire!!! I used cortisone cream for a week to get rid of the dark spots. Currently, I am using arm and hammer unscented deo. It has no aluminum. I still use my protective barrier and the deo works great. It keeps me all day. I used arm and hammer a couple of months ago and it didnt last through the day. Now it does. I'm am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: CocogirlNPNK

customer_reviews.title: Giving up on this one
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a day or so, and I was super excited to be stink-free at the end of work. But then the stink crept back in. It does absorb wetness well but it definitely require reapplication to cover my stink all day. After about a month of regular use I started to notice that rash that is in all those pictures. I’m bummed it didn’t work out for me but maybe it’ll work for you if you have a mild amount of BO and don’t shave your pits.
customer_reviews.author: Schmooz

customer_reviews.title: Dries out the skin on your fingers
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to love this natural deodorant as I don’t like the feeling of trying to apply a dry solid stick. The smell is great, love the idea.... but it dries out the skin on the fingers you use to warm, and apply, the product. To the creators - could you possibly create an applicator that is superior to a dry solid stick deodorant?
customer_reviews.author: Kmkchicago

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This changed my life! Seriously, this is amazing I always hated putting on deodorant and would just use it everyother day but then I looked for a natural one and I chose this one and I absolutely love it and use it everyday. I don't sweat much but I can tell this does a great job, It smells wonderful has a light refreshing scent once on.i raved about it so much my friend bought it too and she loves it! It takes getting used to putting on with your fingers but it's no big deal, my stick did break in half the first week but I just use my Plackers after I floss now
customer_reviews.author: cali vanny

customer_reviews.title: Gritty but works
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Schmidt's natural deodorant purchase. My first jar was great, but I wanted to try a different smell. This jar smells so yummy, BUT--it is terribly gritty. I have to leave it under my arms to melt for a minute and still, when smoothing it on, it never loses it's grit and a lot of the product falls off :( I don't know if it was the batch that was bad or what, but I will certainly return my next jar if it proves the same as this one. It does work however--no underarm odor whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much the best thing to ever happen to me...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Schmidt's deodorant. I had been lucky enough to stumble upon a jar of this on sale at TJ Maxx and I loved it. I haven't been able to find it in store since, so I tried a local option (Tom's of Maine) and it gave me some serious underarm irritation. Schmidt's deodorant smells wonderful, works effectively, contains good ingredients (that you can pronounce and understand), AND it LASTS. My jar lasted me a good 5 or six months. This is the only deodorant I will be purchasing here on out!
customer_reviews.author: TrampledRose21

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a clean deodorant that actually works, this is it. It's one of the few I've had success with over the years. At first I was completely weirded out by having to apply it with a tiny spatula, but it's really not a big deal at all. I make my own now that I apply with my fingers (the hippie lifestyle is a slippery slope), but I still recommend this to people. NOTE: It's a deodorant, NOT an antiperspirant, so you're still going to sweat, you just won't smell.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Completely masks odor
customer_reviews.text: This is officially the only deodorant I will buy. I purchased this a few years ago at New Seasons Market and have been buying it on Amazon ever since. I do a lot of running around and have a very active job which causes me to sweat. This product not only smells great, but completely gets rid of any odors I might have when sweating. It does work best when armpits are shaved, so that is something to take in to account. I take a pea sized scoop (you don't need much), rub it between my fingers to warm it up and then smooth it out on my armpit. Works like a charm. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nikko and Doug

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many deodorants in the past, all sorts of antiperspirants (for some reason they make me stink even worse than if I put on nothing), extra strength ones that I swear it felt like it was burning the flesh off my body, natural ones, and many different home remedies. NONE of them worked until I found Schmidt's Deodorant! This stuff is the best! Yes, it may be a tad inconvenient because you have to rub it onto your pits with your fingertips, but it is so worth it! I'm finally free to wear sleeveless tops and synthetic material tops without having to wear a cotton t-shirt underneath to help absorb sweat and odor! Thank you Schmidt's!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise T.

customer_reviews.title: smells clean and crisp.
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant smells amazing and works fairly well. I'm a personal trainer so I sweat a lot. If I am able to reapply this throughout the day it works well. The application stick wasn't very useful to me, I just started using my fingers to scoop it out of the jar. I love the clean scent! Bergamot is one of my favorite essential oils. This is a great alternative to anti-perspirant if you are looking to go the more natural route, it just takes a little more work on your part. No harmful chemicals is the biggest plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jane

customer_reviews.title: Schmidt’s deodorant review
customer_reviews.text: I bought this deodorant a few weeks ago and have used it a few times. Perhaps I’m just not used to using this type of spreadable deodorant as opposed to my regular deodorant but I’m not a big fan of this product. I like Schmidt’s products and I like that they are healthy but recently purchased the stick deodorant from Schmidt’s and I feel that is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa and Gary

customer_reviews.title: ... tried a few natural deodorants and Schmidt's works the best! I truly test it when I'm out in ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few natural deodorants and Schmidt's works the best! I truly test it when I'm out in the heat delivering mail all day! The other ones I had to make sure I wash after I got home from work because they did work...Schmidt's works! I've used the stick but I prefer the jar. The stick has problems moving the deodorant up and with the jar it's easier to control how much you put on and easier to warm it. I'm happy I found a natural deodorant that works!
customer_reviews.author: Iluvtheredsox04

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent, good consistency.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product, I liked the scent and consistency of the deodorant in the jar. Unfortunately, my skin didn't care for it and I had a little bit of an itchy reaction, which is a risk you have to take when trying natural products. I was hopeful that the product would work for me, but it didn't.. that's no fault of the item at all, though. Just wasn't compatible with my body chemistry, so your mileage may vary as well. It was worth a try for me, and I'm sorry it didn't work out.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Messy application, like trying to put blue cheese crumbles in your armpit
customer_reviews.text: My biggest issue with this is that it is very hard to work with and apply. I broke the little spatula thing trying to get the product out the first time and it crumbles everywhere and makes a mess almost like handling blue cheese crumbles. Attached a photo of what it looks like before applying. It's a very hard consistency and you have to warm it between your fingers but it still is easy to get it everywhere. It's not worth the hassle even though I like the idea of the jar application. The deodorant works good but not worth the mess you have to clean up afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Grant

customer_reviews.title: Raw pits after two uses.
customer_reviews.text: Rubs my pits raw fter two uses. What a waste of money. Wish I could get a refund or get it replaced for free with the ;"better" version they are replying to all these contents with. Wish I had read all these 1-star reviews before the expense. Looks like some people even develop red bumps they can't get rid of!
customer_reviews.author: PsychSchematics  🌟

customer_reviews.title: I have used Degree antiperspirant pretty much all my life
customer_reviews.text: So I just turned 40 and have been on a natural kick lately. I am using coconut oil for my skin instead of lotions and now am trying this deodorant. This is my first time using a natural deordorant. I have used Degree antiperspirant pretty much all my life. I have been using this for over a week now and am very surprised that it works so well. There have been day or two I stay inside and don't take a shower and I am still not musty. I'm hooked. My only gripe is the little paddle to scoop the material out broke.
customer_reviews.author: N. Spears

customer_reviews.title: We found Schmidt’s and have been really pleased. It works on me (a fat thirtysomething Dad)
customer_reviews.text: We have used Jungleman in our household for about three years. Jungleman works—unlike most natural deodorants—but it’s so dry, it applies poorly, the scents are too light to the point of being indistinguishable, and they charge you shipping. We found Schmidt’s and have been really pleased. It works on me (a fat thirtysomething Dad), and my wife loves the scent and how it goes on. Plus, they seem to be very engaged with their customers. We received several emails about how to use it and gauge our happiness. That’s a small thing, but goes a long way to show how much they care about their business. We recommend over any other natural deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: A. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: The scent and texture are awesome! I really wanted to love this product but ...
customer_reviews.text: The scent and texture are awesome! I really wanted to love this product but I've twice gotten big red rashes on my Pitts with a break back to conventional deo for a few days. Baking soda is the 2nd ingredient and it may be too high a concentration for some. I am one of the some unfortunately m. I hope Schmidtts starts offering more options like primal pit paste. They have a regular strength, light strength and no baking strength. This must be considered when a fair share of customers complain about arm pit rashes. If the company will make some formula adjustments then they will have a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed and it's not good.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased Schmidt's Natural Deodorant since 2016 and have loved it. This last jar is very different. The texture is almost sandy, i't's dry and is difficult to liquefy in my hands for application. I'd like a replacement and I'd also like to know if this is an isolated issue or if I need to find a new deodorant? Thx
customer_reviews.author: gabriel J. forzano

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it's it's because I got the unscented, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's it's because I got the unscented, but I it doesn't seem to work very well for me. I used it after a shower, then went to sleep, woke with an odor. After my workout, I also had an odor. I increased the amount I used, but didn't fix my problem. I have a slight underarm itch, and redness. I'm not sure if I'm allergic to an ingredient. I picked this kind because it was all natural with very few ingredients. This is my first all natural deodorant, that I remember. Maybe it's the arrowroot?
customer_reviews.author: ADW

customer_reviews.title: Does not melt into skin.
customer_reviews.text: I got this and the schmidts stick. Neither worked for me. This one is nearly impossible to melt into my skin. It just sits on top. I have to rub and rub and rub, leaving my pits red and irritated. Maybe it is because I have dry skin? Or maybe my body temperature is lower? I gave it to my partner who liked it much better than the stick. It apparently rubs in fine to his skin, even with the armpit hair. He only needs to use it once a week to keep odors at bay. With conventional deodorant, he only needed to use it once every couple weeks to keep odors at bay.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Why did you mess with a good thing?? (Beware, it's a new formula)
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by stating, I'm very sensitive to textures/scents. I've used Schmidts lavendar deodorant for years. However, my most recent purchase (July 2018) I notice that it's a much different consistency, which isn't a huge deal buster, BUT the new formulation DOES NOT work as well as the previous one! So unfortunately this will be my last purchase of Shmidts (unless they go back to the old formulation). Update 5/5/20 I don’t know why this review was hidden by the “sensitivity filter”.
customer_reviews.author: S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: ) and this definitely works the best! I was anxious to get the stick because ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different non-aluminum deodorants for the past couple years (natural crystal, old spice, weleda spray, Lavanilla...) and this definitely works the best! I was anxious to get the stick because I had heard it was hard and didn't want to irritate my sensitive skin. This formula works great. I was expecting a goopier texture but this is pretty hard. However, once you warm it up in your hands it goes on smoothly and the lavender and sage scent smells heavenly! I use about a dime to nickel-size amount and it definitely lasts me throughout the day or through my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: I really works
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have been using a competitor stick but wanted something without wax. With my previous brand, I would have odor by the end of the day and assumed that was just the way it would be. I have used this for three full days now and no stink. I dig a little drop out of the jar and spread it on... a little does spread out and I wanted to test a small amount first. No need to increase the quantity of even add more in the day. I live in Tennessee, it's August and I have been outside a bit in jeans and a t-shirt so I have been hot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was really hopeful when I brought this. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really hopeful when I brought this. I was banking on this being my go to deodorant. I did the skin test and determined that it was ok to continue using. After two week of continual use I notice that my armpits were darker. I thought maybe I had failed to scrub under my arms. I was a little confused because I did the same wash routine as always. I later notice the discoloration had gotten even darker. After closely examining I realize that it must be the chemical burn that had been mentioned before. My daughter used it too and had the same thing happen to her and she's under 10. Natural does not always mean without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Really like the bergamot and lime scent. I've tried other natural deodorants before and they either didn't work at all or my arm pits got super irritated. This one seems to be doing well so far. I've been using it for a short while now, and so far no irrigation. As for wetness, it doesn't do much in that department. But I'm not smelly and that wonderful. I showered and used it last night, woke up this morning, did some cleaning, washed the car, worked out for about an hour and I have NO smell.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I want to LOVE this product but it gave me the worst dark brown/reddish rash on my armpits with itchiness! Had to stop using it and see a dermatologist.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: best deodorant I have ever used!!!
customer_reviews.text: my all time favorite deodorant!!!! I was skeptical bc I have tried so many natural deodorants and I wasn't sure if this would be the same as always and I would still stink but this is WAY better than any other I have tried. I haven't tried the kind that comes in the deodorant bottle you just rub on but I have enjoyed this. It really didn't bother me to have to rub it in my underarms with my fingers. it smells so good and now I can't use anything else bc anything else I smell bad and this works wonders for me!
customer_reviews.author: MamaD

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bergamot-lime, rose-vanilla and the lavender-sage. Today it is 80 degrees and I just got finished with a 3 mile walk, 2.6 paddleboarding session and 45 min of cardio. Just know I am a pool of sweat but the Bergamot-lime held up superbly! I will say the one that lasts the most out of the three is the rose vanilla though.
customer_reviews.author: Cherrisa

customer_reviews.title: Great deodorant!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a natural deodorant that didn't leave me smelling stinky midday- just reapply doesn't work as a solution to me. Took some getting used to applying. However, followed some other reviewers about applying some underarms killing time for about 25 seconds and then rubbing in- definitely helps it go on smooth. Just ordered my second jar.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Deodorant I Have Ever Used!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best natural deodorant I have ever used. I have purchased this product several times. I previously used Mitchum (sp??) for women because that was the only product that worked for me but it damaged my clothes time after time. I tried many other natural products with no luck and now only use several scents of the Schmick's deodorant and it not only works like a charm but my clothes are undamaged. Thanks to Schmidt's for making a safe product that works!!
customer_reviews.author: Tess Mc

customer_reviews.title: Best deodorant I've used
customer_reviews.text: The scent is not great (but also not strong when applied) and some people have reactions to the ingredients but this is the best deodorant I've ever used. It keeps the smell away and theoretically (if I didn't sweat much the day before) I could leave the house the next day without reapplying. A small jar lasts because you only need a little dab at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this deodorant
customer_reviews.text: First off: I absolutely LOVE this deodorant. It smells amazing and works really well. At the end of the day, I did not smell gross at all. Unfortunately, I got a nasty pit rash from it. I used this for about a month hoping the rash would eventually go away once I got used to it but it didn't. The rash didn't hurt but it was definitely embarrassingly red. I'm super sad that I had to stop using it because nothing I've found so far has come close to its effectiveness. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Nekogeisha

customer_reviews.title: Currently suffering! Chemical burn city!
customer_reviews.text: Chemical burn caution! I ordered the bergamot+lime, ylang-ylang+calendula, and the lavender+sage scents all at once. I used the deodorant as recommended ("massage a pea-sized amount for both arm pits"). At first, I thought the itching/skin peeling was in response to my body's expulsion of metals present from a decade of using commercial deodorant. However, the picture attached is after months of using Schmidt's. I'm guessing the response is due to the baking soda. It may work better for those that have underarm hair, but I would not suggest it to those that don't grow much hair there or who shave.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: The Best Natural Deodorant I Have Found
customer_reviews.text: After trying and researching many natural deodorants this has become my favorite. This is the only metal-free product so far that has actually worked for me as an antiperspirant and does not need to be applied multiple time throughout the day. The only downside is the application. It comes with a little paddle, so I use that to break it up and rub it on with my hands. It is a little less convenient than a stick but works wonders. The lavender and sage is my favorite. I have recommended it to other friends looking for natural alternatives or who have metal allergies and they are hooked.
customer_reviews.author: ERoth

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I used this stuff for several months but thankfully I have found something better. I'm not a fan of the paste, it requires unnecessary effort. You get this stuff all over your fingers and must wash it off, sounds simple but I'm always in a rush. I don't want to spend time warming this up and then washing it off my hands. You also end up with little crumbs on your sink (or wherever you put it on). And it doesn't last long. One jar would last me about a month and half. I changed over to Bali Secerts and I like that a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi1780

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: The cream takes me back to earliest use of deodorant as a teenager -- only this is all good ingredients! I love the bergamot-lime scent, which is very subtle when worn. It takes some practice to get used to using this product, as the oil base needs warmth to melt enough to spread. Just take a small pinch of the deodorant in your hand and hold it in your armpit for 20 seconds, then rub it in. This product feels both benign and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Saratoga

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it.
customer_reviews.text: As far as keeping the odor at bay it does the job perfectly but on the other hand it gave me an awful burn looks like i got purple bruises and i immediately stopped using it considering that it might be something else that cuased it, fast forward one month lateral decided to give it another go but the same thing happened again, I don’t know how could possibly a “natural deodorant” could cause such harm i guess I’m not changing my natural deodorant ever again “LAVANILA” the OG...amazon have kindly refunded me the decreased price of 8.99$ And i can see why, I originally got it for 10.95$
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Every scent I've tried I love and they all actually work
customer_reviews.text: If you want a natural deodorant Schmidt's is the way to go! I've read reviews where people had skin discoloration, I did not. I did get a mild reaction the first week the first time I used it and then that went away. Every scent I've tried I love and they all actually work, you don't need to reapply and end up smelling gross like other natural deodorants. LOVE this product, stick and jar would recommend to anybody and everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Edited review
customer_reviews.text: Originally I loved this product and gave it five stars. However living in hot and humid Florida has forced me to look for another deodorant manufacturer. The last two shipments arrived as liquids and once they reformed were very very granular and extremely difficult to apply. In fact I can't use the last two bottles because they don't absorb and the large "pebbles" just fall all over the sink. I did like the product and it is a shame but I guess ordering time in Florida would be the winter. Not the company's fault. Just be aware if you live in a very hot and humid area.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: I am slightly disappointed because it was supposed to have a spatula in it and mine came without one. First time buying this so I don’t have a spatula laying around. Will find something similar around the house. Smells good though, we shall see how it works. Also happy to find out that they recycle the glass jars!!
customer_reviews.author: Talitha

customer_reviews.title: i love that i have finally found a product that works ...
customer_reviews.text: i love that i have finally found a product that works for me. this is one of my better products i have ordered in a long time. i have been tired of using the name brand deodorants that just sometimes cost so much for little effort in the ways of covering up orders and keeping you dry with chemicals and toxins we shouldn't have in our bodies anyways. i love the smell and use of Schmidt's Natural deodorant. no chemical burns as some other reviewers have experienced. no rash and i love it =)
customer_reviews.author: trueblu

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, caused irritation and red bumps on underarms!!
customer_reviews.text: As an attempt to live a more natural lifestyle, I was searching for a good replacement product and came across this Schmidt's Lavender and Sage deodorant. I decided to give it a try and after a few weeks of applying, I developed rashes, redness, itching, swelling and irritation on my underarms not to mention severe discoloration. I've read other reviewers mentioned chemical burns but I have not seen a dermatologist for this issue yet so can't confirm mine are burns are well. This was my first time using a "natural" deodorant and I am extremely disappointed with this product. This will be the last time I buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in his natural deodorant
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this natural deodorant. It's as though I'm not wearing any! While the smell itself is delicious and relaxing, I smell like my regular BO self by 2pm. The whole combination of smells so fiercely stinks up the armpit area of my shirts and sweaters. I've used other natural deoderants that have worked other (Death by Lavender is good!), but this was a real disappointment. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie G

customer_reviews.title: It smells good and works great
customer_reviews.text: For years I've been using deodorant for under my armpits after I wash, as the years went by the boils start to develop and I totally stopped using deodorant because of the aluminum. A family member of mine introduced me to this product and that family member was right. I worked excellent underneath the armpits without a boil breakout.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reid

customer_reviews.title: i love that i have finally found a product that works ...

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied with Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product numerous times from another seller. This product was awful, grainy like sand paper. It should have been creamy. It did not come in original packaging, nor did it have a spatula. It did not seem like an authentic product. This seller did not accept returns. I would not buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Usually fine
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Schmidt's deodorant for a few months now and it was a great product until this most recent one. I think it wasn't mixed properly because the normally smooth texture is now course, rough, and doesn't actually apply or stick very well. The color used to be white but this latest is like a horrible mottled blend of yellow and brown more like vomit than anything else. I really hope this is just a bad batch because I really did like the other containers I purchased previously.
customer_reviews.author: OnaniKnight

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough how GOOD this deodorants are!! I use to have bad pit odor and all deodorants irritated my skin and stopped working after a few applications. Today I can say I don't have to worry about stinking and having to change. Also, now that it takes some time to get use to them because at the beginning they work and then it seems like it stops working because your pits get irritated and stinky but it's the detox process and you will get over that stage like I did, and now I am reaping the rewards of being stinky, sweaty, and hurt free!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria C Southard

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: Loved this when I first bought it. the smell is fantastic and it works really well against odor and dampness. Sadly, after a few weeks, I got red, scaly patches under my arms from the high baking soda content. If you have sensitive skin, the baking soda in this might be too strong for you. I recommend trying Weleda's spray deodorants instead.
customer_reviews.author: Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, spatula has no real value.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, typical deodorant paste without aluminum which is good, means it doesn't prevent wetness of course. Nice smell. Paste isn't smooth but clumps and falls apart so my major criticism is the use of a tiny plastic spatula on a vertical surface is impossible and it all winds up crumbling to the counter or floor. Clearly no one actually tested it before throwing that in. I got a big brush similar to an old-fashioned barbers brush for shave cream and it works far better.
customer_reviews.author: Pallas

customer_reviews.title: Jury is still out
customer_reviews.text: Jury is still out because I'm trying a bunch of different deodorants, having been poisoning myself with aluminum and parabens for the last 40 years or so, so I know it will take some time to detox. In the meantime, I put more than a "dab" in between my palms and rub together to get it warm, then I use my palms to apply to each pit. Any sweating at all makes the nice fragrance go away pretty quickly, so that's a drag, But like I said, the jury is still out. I hope I can stick with the natural brands.
customer_reviews.author: S. Diller

customer_reviews.title: Lavender & Sage smells good, doesn't leave white residue on clothes
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Lavender & Sage smells good, doesn't leave white residue on clothes, & does an ok job of deodorizing. A little goes a long way. Despite other users' reviews, I did not have an allergic reaction to it (& I have very sensitive skin & have had allergic reactions to other deodorants before). Cons: It is very crumbly and a royal pain in the ass to apply. I use the mini-spatula inside to put some on my hands, then rub my pits. As this occurs, it breaks apart and can be tricky to not drop all over the floor.
customer_reviews.author: CAH

customer_reviews.title: I used it for a week and I was working and going to school so I was out of the house from 6am to 9pm and it was wonderful. UNFOR
customer_reviews.text: The product really works it gets rid of smell [absolutely no smell], I used it for a week and I was working and going to school so I was out of the house from 6am to 9pm and it was wonderful. UNFORTUNATELY, it gave me a nasty rash after a week and I refused to believe it because I loved this product so much that I tried it again a few months later and I bought one for my sister thinking maybe I was sensitive but she got a rash almost immediately after using it. :( sad to say that there is no smell and it works but you will pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: hashcakes101

customer_reviews.title: Great if you can do baking soda!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far, one of the best natural deodorants my family has used. It smells good and is strong enough to only reapply once per day. I've used many other kinds of deodorants and some need to be reapplied hourly. Reapplying is something my family has just gotten used to in order to avoid harsh chemicals and metals. I have trouble with this product because I have a baking soda sensitivity but the rest of my family does not. If you have a sensitivity like mine, you may want to find a product without baking soda. If you don't have a problem with it, this product is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed for the worse.
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased this product and liked it. After running low, I purchased another jar of the same variety and this time it immediately resulted a nasty rash that slowly abated after I stopped using it. I emailed the company and they responded very quickly saying that they had not changed their formula. Either I developed a sensitivity to the ingredients that coincidentally occurred with the exact time I started using the new jar or something has changed. Too bad, the listed ingredients are natural and I liked the minimalist packaging. Still, I'm going to discard this as unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Erehwon

customer_reviews.title: I've been searching for a good, aluminum free deodorant for years
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a good, aluminum free deodorant for years! I used to use addidas cotton absorb until they stopped making it- but this is even better! It has no freaky ingredients and I am honestly shocked at how well it works. I can get a little stinky especially after a workout, but this truly lasts all day, even when I'm active. And i love the smell! Besides the downside of having to smear it on with my fingers instead of having it in a bar form, I love everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Works but has a funny smell
customer_reviews.text: To start I do not have a strong axillary smell but I do exercise regularly after work. I still feel protected after a long day at work and gym time. The paste like product is grainy and you must use your fingers to apply it, preferable in the shower as particles drop during application. The product has a funny herb, dirty combination smell to me, no bad enough to deter me from using it. Once you apply it the smell goes away. Does not caked on your arm pit but you must rub it until it disappears. I wish the product would come as a bar to help with application and save time.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Grassmann

customer_reviews.title: Caused itchy rash :(
customer_reviews.text: I went through a few containers of this product and used to love it. It smells great and really prevents you from sweating, BUT the product in the 2 jars I ordered last caused very itchy rash that lasted for weeks!! I thought maybe it was me or there is something else that caused it, so I gave it a break. I tried it again and the result was the same - a few weeks of red and itchy armpits :(. The worst part is I have never been allergic to anything and don't even have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Anna D

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY- RASH & BURNING
customer_reviews.text: EDIT TO PREVIOUS POSITIVE REVIEW: DO NOT BUY! In less than two weeks, I have additional skin darkening, which I didn't realize at first since my underarms already had darkness. I have burning and itchiness now all throughout the day. Discontinuing use. Disappointed. Hopefully coconut oil and no deodorant for a few days will heal me. FIRST TWO PICS ARE BEFORE(FEW MONTHS AGO) ---LAST TWO PICS ARE AFTER (W/ COCONUT OIL)
customer_reviews.author: CiCi

customer_reviews.title: A better choice than the stick version!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the stick form of this, but even with one swipe it felt like I was getting deodorant everywhere and wasting tons of it! So I decided to switch to this little bad boy. I’m not a major sweater so I barely need a pea sized piece, so this jar is going to last forever. I have better results warming it up in my fingers before rubbing it on, but it’s still only September and super hot in my house. The only catch is that it wouldn’t deliver to a PO Box so it ended up sitting on my hot porch and melting and leaking outside the container and into its bubble wrap packaging.
customer_reviews.author: bri

customer_reviews.title: Non sensitive person having a reaction?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure. I love how they smell (purchased bergamot & lime and lavender). Used it for a few weeks & I have some kind of underarm rash that I’d describe after looking it up as needing anti fungal cream. Noticed others citing a chemical burn. What’s concerning is I don’t have sensitive skin so this is highly unusual. I have heard when you switch to natural deodorant your body is filtering out chemicals. I’m going to keep trying but all while using anti fungal cream first & will update.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya S. Mirabal

customer_reviews.title: My curreny go-to deodorant
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff. I find it very effective - probably the most effective fully natural, non-toxic deodorant I have used in the nearly 30 years since I switched from the synthetic deodorants. It's easy enough to use and smells good. After a long day of sweating in the heat, I find I don't smell. I may not smell like roses, but I don't stink.
customer_reviews.author: Botany Bill

customer_reviews.title: Best aluminum free deodorant I have used!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic aluminum-free deodorant! I tried some of the other top rated aluminum free deodorants on Amazon and this is my favorite by far. This keeps me smelling fresh and clean all day. Note it's deodorant and not anti-perspirant, so you will still sweat on extremely stressful or hot days. I work on a trading floor, and this is an amazing product. I'm a happy convert from traditional deodorant/anti-perspirant that I have used until I read about the impact of aluminum in your body.
customer_reviews.author: AM21

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Love the smell. I don't have anything bad to say about it. 3/27/18 updated: It works really well for a long time, but then it didn't really work as well. Maybe my body chemistry is changing. Or maybe the shea butter clogged my pores. But the sweat smell worse now. It used to be able to last like 5 days now it'll last about two. You have bathe everyday or else. But it might work for you. Just try it and see if you like it. But be warned you might have to alternate.
customer_reviews.author: Incognito

customer_reviews.title: Cause irritations
customer_reviews.text: I thought that since it is natural product then it will be good unfortunately it caused horrible irritation to my skin. I like to say that I don't shave my underarm so I didn't understand why the product irritated my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amal

customer_reviews.title: Works but hurts :(
customer_reviews.text: I used this daily for about 8 months. It works better than even traditional, chemical-laden deodorants. I could go more than 24 hours and a workout with absolutely no odor. Then, after about a month, I got the rash. I pushed through for months, hoping it would go away or I would get used to the product, but I have had to stop using. My underarms - one in particular - are raw. There is rash that is almost becoming scabby and the skin is peeling off. Very disappointed because I haven't tried anything that has worked this well. I hope the company can find a solution to this problem that many people seem to be having.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: It works well to control odor.
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice to work with as the shark tank one I used to buy but can't find anymore. its a little to thick and hard to apply, Needs to be more creamy to make application easier. I have to work to get it not to fall all over the place when applying it. It works well to control odor.
customer_reviews.author: T S

customer_reviews.title: Love the product; not my favorite scent
customer_reviews.text: Schmidt's makes a great solid natural deodorant. Many "natural" deodorants are not effective for my sweaty pits, or irritate my skin, but I like solid/paste natural deodorants because they generally smell nice all day. I've bought this product before from Schmidt's, and it worked great. They also have a glass jar reuse program! I am NOT a fan of this Ylang-Ylang and Calendula scent, so I'd recommend the lavender or a different scent. I'll buy this product again, but not in this scent. At least the scent isn't too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice and works ALL day
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice and works ALL day. I could still smell a bit of it after the gym. I only wish the texture was easier to work with. You have to scrape some and then hold it between your fingers and let the warmth melt it a bit, otherwise it just crumbles. If it were more like a lotion it would be much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and is a good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the smell of this product with the bergamot and lime essential oils. The texture is firmer than primal pit paste but if you warm it between your fingers you can pat it on under your arms and it does apply well. It works well but not as long lasting as the primal pit paste. I will use this product again. I wish it was a bit easier to apply and creamier in texture and applied a little easier. But the scent is great and would be good for men or women.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: This deodorant changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I had a baby just over a year ago, and since that time nothing has worked for me. I was cycling through deodorant every couple weeks trying to find something that would keep me dry, but mostly mask the body odor smell. Then I found Schmidt's Deodorant. I could not be happier! It is truly an amazing product. The scent is light (Lavender + Sage) and after awhile I don't even notice it. I don't sweat as much, but even when I do, no smell. I don't even care that it's in a jar and not a stick. I just ordered my second jar today and will continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

product_meta.title: Schmidt's Natural Deodorant - Bergamot and Lime, 2 ounces. Jar for Women and Men
feature_bullets: We’re On a Mission to Change the Way You Think About Natural.
Schmidt's award-winning formulas help neutralize odor and keep you fresh, naturally.
Free of aluminum, propylene glycol, parabens, phthalates, and artificial fragrance, our plant and mineral-derived formulas are certified vegan and cruelty-free.

Our signature formula, packaged in elegant and sustainable glass jars, is highly effective at helping to neutralize odor and keep you fresh. Many find that the jar formula offers more direct control over the application process. A non-greasy, non-sticky feel allows our deodorants to be easily absorbed. It works amazingly well!
With its bright citrus scent, Bergamot and Lime is a true pleasure to wear.
